ygData.subject: I'm getting married!
ygData.msgSnippet: I never intended to get married in EQ, but somehow it has happened.  Luna my 50th level enchanter will be marrying Duna a 45th level monk on Brell Serelis.
ygData.messageBody:
I never intended to get married in EQ, but somehow it has happened. Luna
my 50th level enchanter will be marrying Duna a 45th level monk on Brell
Serelis. Details of the wedding have not been finalized, but it will
probably happen in about two weeks. I'll try and post more information to
the list when I get it. We may be married in the throne room of King
Tranix the fire giant, in which case attendence of the wedding would be
limited to those levels 40+. We may have a more mundane wedding, in which
case I would like to invite everyone to attend. I think a nice alternate
wedding spot would be the erollisi sisters island, only I'm worried some
of the guests would be KOS =/ Nothing makes a wedding suck more than NPCs
trying to kill your friends.

- Christina
